divs: Sighting DetailsAround 7:45pm a lighted object appears fairly low in the northern sky. The object appears to be shimmering with the naked eye but when you look at it through binoculars it is red,green and white simultaneously and giving off a pulsating effect. This object slowly descends until it is out of sight which takes about 45 minutes to 60 minutes. Also there are at least three other lighted objects,smaller but stationary, spread out in the sky but farther east of the afformentioned object. These three have the same colors and pulsating effect. a 1.Standing on porch looking at stars. 2.Shimmering effect. 3.A star. 4.Already did. 5.A very strong desire to know what they are and to have other people see them. 6.The larger one descended out of sight and the smaller ones were visible for an extended period of time.
trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Fort Collins
There were no other sightings in Fort Collins on or around October 19th 2010
Summary: seen by my wife and I every clear night since october 8th through present. Also showed them to our neighbor.
